column1: 使用“折叠其他集合”时，保持所有选定对象展开
column2: Keep all selected objects expanded when using 'Collapse other collections'

column1: 用于检测大纲视图中的点击，以便在大纲视图中临时禁用自动高亮显示。
column2: Used to detect clicks in outliner to temporarily disable auto hightlight while you are in outliner.

column1: 用于检测视窗中的点击，以便在点击大纲视图时暂时禁用自动高亮后重新启用自动高亮。
column2: Used to detect clicks in viewport to reenable auto hightlight after it was temporarily disabled when you clicked in outliner.
